API¶

Accesesing Raw Data¶

raw.download(l_exp, log_path, save_path, …) Download raw data for use in analysis.
redcap.cesd(path, token, url, report_id) Download CES-D data for use in analysis.
redcap.demographics(path, token, url, report_id) Download demographics data for use in analysis.
redcap.mmpi(path, token, url, report_id[, …]) Download MMPI data for use in analysis.

Preprocessing¶

processing.preprocess(df, window) Initial data cleaning.
processing.run(path[, task_type, …]) Processing of data.

Data analysis¶

model.anova(config, y, f, df, csv, path[, …]) Run analysis of variance model using rpy2, seaborn and pandas.
model.glmer_nb
model.logistic(config, y, f, df, me, …[, …]) Run logistic regression model, using rpy2, seaborn and pandas.

Relational plots¶

plot.bokeh_calibration(config, df, cxy, event) Create calibration matrix, using pandas and bokeh.
plot.bokeh_trial(config, df, stim_bounds, …) Create single subject trial bokeh plots.
plot.cooks_plot(config, y, model, path, df) Create cooks distance plot plot using seaborn, pandas, and statsmodel.
plot.corr_matrix(config, df, path, title, method) Create correlation matrix using bokeh and pandas
plot.density_plot(config, df, title) Create density plot (draws kernel density estimate), using seaborn and pandas
plot.logit_plot(config, df, path, param) Create logistic regression plot using seaborn and pandas
plot.onset_diff_plot(config, df, meta, drop, y) Plot onset differences using pandas and seaborn.
plot.qq_plot_r(config, y, residuals, path) Create probability plot using seaborn, pandas, and rpy2.
plot.residual_plot_r(config, y, residuals, path) Create probability plot using seaborn, pandas, and rpy2.
